headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs https://www.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://api.wheel-size.com; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
